Set of messages 1.Message:
Superpowers
•	Think of a superpower. For example, going anywhere instantly, travelling in time, reading minds. 
•	Ask your child “If you had the superpower to […] how would you use it?
•	Encourage them to give themselves a superhero name and act it out. 
•	Now let them choose a super power for you!
•	Make sure you act it out too!
